abstract: Two Dow officials, who were fired after the company accused them of conspiring in a buyout, have sued the company for defamation, and Dow has sued them right back.
snippet: Two Dow officials, who were fired after the company accused them of conspiring in a buyout, have sued the company for defamation, and Dow has sued them right back.
lead_paragraph: On March 23, Andrew N. Liveris, the chief executive of Dow Chemical, wrote a scathing performance review about one of his top lieutenants.

headline.main: Behind the Dow Chemical Firings, a Tangled Corporate Drama
headline.print_headline: Behind the Dow Chemical Firings, a Tangled Corporate Drama

abstract: The S.E.C. said a Hong Kong couple bought up shares before Rupert Murdoch’s offer was made public.
snippet: The S.E.C. said a Hong Kong couple bought up shares before Rupert Murdoch’s offer was made public.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission filed a complaint today against a Hong Kong couple, accusing them of “highly profitable and highly suspicious” trading of stock of Dow Jones & Company ahead of the announcement last week that the News Corporation had offered $60 a share for the company.

headline.main: 2 Accused of ‘Suspicious’ Trading in Dow Jones Bid

abstract: Regulators are expected to examine the role of a Dow Jones director in the possible leak of inside information about Rupert Murdoch’s takeover offer.
snippet: Regulators are expected to examine the role of a Dow Jones director in the possible leak of inside information about Rupert Murdoch’s takeover offer.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators are expected to examine the role of a Dow Jones director in the possible leak of inside information to a Hong Kong couple, who were accused yesterday of making millions of dollars from trading shortly before news of Rupert Murdoch’s takeover offer.

headline.main: Scrutiny Seen of Trading in Dow Jones
headline.print_headline: New Focus On Trading In Dow Jones

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Andrew Ross Sorkin

abstract: Federal regulators are expected to examine the role of a Dow Jones director in the possible leak of inside information to a Hong Kong couple, who were accused Tuesday of making millions of dollars from trading shortly before news of Rupert Murdoch’s takeover offer.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators are expected to examine the role of a Dow Jones director in the possible leak of inside information to a Hong Kong couple, who were accused Tuesday of making millions of dollars from trading shortly before news of Rupert Murdoch’s takeover offer.

headline.main: Regulators Are Said to Examine Role of Dow Jones Director in Leaks

abstract: The story behind the firing of two Dow Chemical executives for allegedly being “involved in unauthorized discussions with third parties about the potential acquisition of the company” became even more bizarre – and clouded – as the two men sued Dow Chemical, contending that they were defamed. The company, in turn, has sued both men.
lead_paragraph: The story behind the firing of two Dow Chemical executives for allegedly being “involved in unauthorized discussions with third parties about the potential acquisition of the company” became even more bizarre – and clouded – as the two men sued Dow Chemical, contending that they were defamed. The company, in turn, has sued both men.

headline.main: Dimon Was the Only Source for Dow Chemical Firings

abstract: Who does Rupert Murdoch need to win over in his $5 billion bid to acquire Dow Jones? To answer that question, The New York Observer drew up a family tree of the Bancrofts, who control the publishing company through a special class of stock. Family members include a champion power-boat racer, a retired American Airlines pilot and the head of a Texas private equity firm.
lead_paragraph: Who does Rupert Murdoch need to win over in his $5 billion bid to acquire Dow Jones?
